summary: The Pittsburgh Steelers are a professional American football team based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Founded in 1933, they are one of the oldest teams in the National Football League (NFL). Originally named the Pittsburgh Pirates, they changed their name to Steelers in the 1940s. The team has won six Super Bowl titles, tied with the New England Patriots for the most in the NFL. Known for their passionate fans, called "Steeler Nation," they currently play at Acrisure Stadium. The Steelers have been owned by the Rooney family since their inception.
title: Pittsburgh Steelers
